answer_components: Confirm your separation from your employer.
Provide the necessary details for the rollover.

steps.action: Confirm your separation from your employer and specify the rollover type.
steps.note: You have already confirmed your employment status as terminated.
You mentioned Fidelity as your receiving institution.

steps.action: Submit your rollover request through the participant portal or via the RightSignature electronic form.
steps.note: Ensure you have access to the portal or follow the electronic form process.

warnings: Ensure all information provided is accurate to avoid delays.
If you choose a wire transfer, incorrect bank details may result in non-refundable wire fees.
outcomes: Your rollover request will be processed within 7-10 business days.
You will receive confirmation updates via email once your request is submitted.

guardrails_applied: Did not assume any additional information beyond what was provided.
data_gaps: Missing mailing address for check delivery and contact.

must_not_say: Did not assume any additional information beyond what was provided.
